1.content: Which girl from Jungle de Ikou do you want to grow?
1.title: Who grows?

11.content:
Natsume. Natsume was the girl that turned into Mii in order to protect the city. Mii was the flower goddess. Mii was very voluptuous. Her breast were just so big. Men would come around just to see the very sexy goddess. Natsume didn't like that.

Or that's what she told herself.

Natsume just loved it when she turned into Mii. The way Mii's body was, just excited Natsume. It was so big and sexy. Natsume wished she could have a body like that without doing the dance. Then when Mii grew to gigantic size to stop the evil Ongo, Natsume's hopes for being like Mii skyrocketed. She enjoyed being Mii, But she could probably do without the stares and the ogling that comes from the guys. Especially Takuma Kusanagi staring at her.

Natsume just had to find a way to become like Mii.
11.title: Natsume

111.content:
Natsume was in her backyard. She was thinking about Mii. About how popular Mii was. About what Mii did to save the city from evil Ongo. She was thinking about Mii's body. It was sexy, and curvy, and voluptuous. All she would have to do is take one step, and her entire body was bouncing everywhere. Men would love to see that. Natsume wondered if she will ever have a body like that.

Since that Ongo incident Natsume had not turned into Mii ever since. It had been two months since Mii saved the city, and everyone was asking where Mii had gone to.
At least all of the males were asking.

Mii saved the city by growing to a giant size. It was a dace that made her like that. That dance was very strange. Old guys and small spirits were dancing with her. The end of the dance cause her to grow.

Grow. What would it feel like to grow to a giant size? Natsume stood up. She started doing the movements of the dance as best as she could remember.

During that dance she started to feel hot. The same hot feeling she felt when she would turn into Mii. Only this time it was different. This feeling increased. Natsume clenched and closed her eyes. When she opened them, everything around her looked smaller. Then it looked like everything kept getting smaller. But it wasn't that.

Natsume was getting taller.

Natsume grew and grew, her body increasing in size. She kept getting taller until she stopped at...

100ft tall. That how tall Natsume had become. The warm feeling had gone away.

Natsume looked around. Everything was small compare to her large size. Some people were looking at the large Natsume.

Natsume just smiled. She was big. Now sh was going to....

11111.content:
"I bet Nami's going to be surprised when she sees me!" Natsumi headed to Nami Kuki's house. As she walked her steps caused the ground to shake. She drew everyone's attention, whether it was fear or excitement. People stared and took pictures of her. Some people fled the city. Natsumi ignored the people for now and continued on her way.

It did not take long for Natsumi to reach her destination. "Nami! It's me Natsumi! Come outside!" Natsumi yelled.

The door opened and Nami Kuki stepped outside. She noticed it was dark when it was suppose to be sunny. Nami looked up to see Natsumi staring down at her. At first Nami was shocked but she quickly composed herself. "Natsumi, what happened to you?" she asked.

"I did a dance and it made me huge!" Natsumi answered smiling. Nami accepted the answer.

What happened next was...
11111.title: Natsumi visits Nami

choices: Nami does the dance herself and grows
111111.content:
"Show me the dance." Nami requested.

Natsumi looked down at her friend. "You want me to do the dance?" she responded.

"Yes." Nami answered.

Natsumi continued to look down at her friend, then smiled. She understood what Nami really wanted. "Okay! I'll do this for you Nami!"

Natsumi performed the dance steps, her movements causing the ground to shake. She chanted the words, her voice echoing throughout the city. Nami watched her friend intensely. Natsumi felt her body warmed up. Soon she began to grow.

"Yes! I'm getting bigger!" Natsumi shouted.

'I wanted to see the dance for myself. I'm glad to see that it really works.' Nami thought. The sight of Natsumi growing was exciting her.

Natsumi grew, towering over more and more of the neighborhood. She stopped growing when she reached 200ft tall. Natsumi looked down at Nami and smiled. "See Nami?!" she exclaimed. "The dance really does work!"

"Yes." Nami responded. Thank you for showing it to me."
111111.title: Natsumi shows Nami the dance

choices: Natsumi and Nami walk around the city
1111112.content:
Almost immediately, Nami Kuki performed the dance herself. She followed the dance steps and chanted the words just as Natsumi Rokudo had done.

'I want to be big!' Nami thought.

As soon as she had finished Nami felt her body warm up. She saw the neighborhood and everything around her get smaller from her point of view. Nami smiled.

'I'm so glad that this dance works! Now I can be big!'

Natsumi just smiled as she watched her friend grow. Natsumi wasn't surprised that Nami did the dance, but she was surprised at how quickly her friend did it. Natsumi guess that Nami would have waited at least an hour or two before doing it. Despite that Natsumi was happy that her best friend was going to be a giant along with her.

Nami grew until she was 100ft tall. She was upset that she wasn't as big as Natsumi, but Nami was glad that the dance worked. She would be sure to dance later and make herself even bigger.

Natsume was in a jewelry store. She was just looking around. A lady at the counter said, "Can I help you find something?"

"No than you. I'm just looking around." Natsume said.

"Maybe I can interest you in these earrings?" the lady said as she held out a pair of ruby earrings. "These earrings were said to have belonged to a goddess that granted her with amazing powers. These powers helped her rule over her country hundreds of years ago. These earrings would look just lovely on you. Would you like to buy them?"

Natsume stared at the earrings. She thought, "They do look lovely. I wonder who that goddess was. What powers did these earrings give her? I would like some new earrings. Ever since the Ongo incident I haven't been able to find a right pair for myself. I'll buy them."

"I'll buy them." Natsume said. The lady handed her the earrings. She paid for the earrings and left.

The lady said to herself, "That little girl is in for a big surprise."

1543121.content:
Before Natsumi could think of a solution to her mother’s predicament, Haruka’s stomach gave a loud rumble. The vibrations were enough to knock Natsumi off her feet. The giant, naked women placed her other hand on her stomach and looked at her tiny daughter sheepishly.

‘Sorry about that dear. I didn’t get a chance to cook breakfast. I could really go for just about anything right now” Haruka scanned the area around, almost hoping that something she could eat would just appear out of nowhere.

At this moment, Suki decided to make her first contact with her new vessel. She had been trapped in the ring for centuries, imprisoned by humans who had feared her power. She would have her revenge on mankind and this simple housewife would help her in that goal.

Looking through Haruka’s eyes, she saw Natsumi on her palm, barely a speck to the giant women. Zooming in, Suki noticed with shock that this girl was wearing the necklace and earrings of Mii. This could make things more difficult.

Suki entered the mind of Haruka, become a little voice in the back of her head. She focused on Haruka growing hunger, a result of her massive growth and directed in away from normal human food and towards something else entirely.

Natsumi was thinking hard, about how both to reverse her mother’s growth and how to feed her in the meantime. So focused was she that she different notice the strange look in her mother’s eyes, like she was having a conversation with herself.

She was shook from her thinking when Haruka suddenly moved, bending down and reaching with her hand towards something on the ground. The massive size difference made it difficult to make out what she was doing or what see had picked up at first. As her mother brought her hand back up, her confusion mounted.

Why had Haruka just picked up a whole bunch of their neighbors? After their initial panic, most of the people in the neighborhood had calmed down and were just staring at the giant, naked women. She knew from experience how annoying it was to have a much of people ogle you while being giant-sized, but that was no reason to pick them up.

The confusion turned to horror as Haruka lifted the people up high, opened her mouth and dropped them in. The people’s screams of terror were cut off as Haruka closed her mouth, swallowing the poor people whole. Haruka licked her lips in satisfaction and began scanning the ground for more people to eat.

“Mom! What are you doing!?” Natsumi shouted, not wanting to believe what she had witness been real. Haruka raised the hand that held Natsumi closer to her face and looked down at her tiny daughter.

“What’s wrong sweetie? I was just so hungry and…those little people looked so tasty. They were tasty…” Haruka’s voice didn’t have a trace of guilt over her action. Looking closer, Natsumi could see that her eyes were clouded and seemed to glow a faint green color. Something was seriously wrong with her mother, something magical in nature.

Haruka gazed out across the neighborhood and to the city beyond, a hungry look on her face.

“I want more. More tasty treats… They deserved it…for what they did…” Haruka was speaking almost in trance, like it was someone else talking. The hungry gaze looked back at the small Natsumi, contemplating.

What happened next?

Natsumi was still shocked by Haruka's wish, but she knew that her mother was right. Natsumi had always wanted to be tall. Ever since the incident with Mii turning into a giantess to stop Ongo, her desire to be tall had only increased. Natsumi couldn't help but smile as the crowd that was staring at Haruka began to stare at her as well.

1552112424.content:
"Haruka! Haruka!"

Haruka and Natsumi looked to see that Mii had arrived. The crowd that was taking pictures of Haruka also began taking pictures of Mii.

"Mii!" Haruka exclaimed. "It's so good to see you!" Ever since the Once incident, Mii and Rongo had separated from their hosts bodies. The two goddesses would frequently visit Haruka's home.

"Haruka how did you get so tall?" Mii asked.

Haruka showed the wishing stone. "I found this stone. It can grant wishes. I used it to make myself taller."

"I did sense magic being used in the city just now. That's why I'm here." Mii said.

"What are you going to do Mii?" Natsumi asked.

Mii thought about it. A stone that could grant wished could most definitely cause problems. However, Mii felt that she could trust Haruka with the stone. Haruka was a kind woman. If there were any problems, Mii felt that Haruka would surely fix it.

"I'm going to let you keep the stone Haruka!" Mii said.

"I'm home!" Natsumi Rokudo called from the front of the house.

'Looks like Natsumi's home early.' Haruka Rokudo thought.

"Mother where are you?" Natsumi asked.

"I'm in the back yard!" Haruka answered. She could wait for Natsumi to see how tall she was.

About a minute later Natsumi arrived. "I said I'd be coming in late tonight, but we finished early, so I -" Natsumi stopped when she saw Haruka. She gasped, then yelled, "Mother! When did you get so tall?!"

1553.content:
Haruka Rokudo woke up early, like she does every day.

However, Haruka realized that she felt different this morning. She felt as is she had suddenly gained something.

She got out of bed and got dressed. As soon as she finished, she realized what was different about her. Haruka now had a power! Haruka now had the power to change her size, or anyone else's.

To be able to make herself bigger or smaller. To be able to make other people bigger or smaller. This sounded so interesting to Haruka. She didn't know how she obtained this power, but she was glad that she had it now.

info.brief_description: Make the girls from Jungle de Ikou grow
info.description:
Make the girls from Jungle de Ikou grow.
1. Only the girls can grow.
2. The girls cannot shrink.
3. No guys can grow.
4. No characters can die.
5. Make the girls as big as you want.
6. Not that much sex.
7. They can go on a rampage if want them to.
8. There may be more than one giantess
9. Proper grammar and spelling. No one sentence chapters. Chapters must be at least one paragraph.
10. PLEASE UPDATE.
